module: Module-level comment: The 'Test' module simulates the 'Codec' module by randomly varying input data (`data_in`) and bit flips (`bit_flip`) under a toggling clock (`clk`). It initializes inputs to zero, then continuously modifies `data_in` and `bit_flip` every 10 ns to test 'Codec' responses, while `clk` toggles every 10 ns to drive sequential logic. Outputs are observed through `data_out` to verify 'Codec' functionality.
